summary: A configuration holder for the OneFormer segmentation model that encapsulates all architectural choices, backbone selection, transformer dimensions, loss weighting, and training/inference flags, enabling consistent model instantiation.
business_intent: Provides a flexible way to set up and customize a OneFormer model for various computerâ€‘vision tasks, allowing users to select backbones, adjust hyperparameters, control loss components, and toggle training or inference mode without modifying code.
